import React from "react"; import { LogOut, History, Settings, PlusSquare, GraduationCap } from "lucide-react"; const VolunteerProfile = ({ user }) => { const avatarUrl = user.avatar || "/placeholder/avatar.png"; return (

{user.fullName}

{user.email}

About Me

  • Skills: {user.skills || "N/A"}
  • Availability: {user.availability || "Not Provided"}
  • Experience: {user.experience || "No experience yet"}
); }; export default VolunteerProfile;
